column3: Added suggested improvements and fixes from #15995

tACK ~6c8b98b5bf8c3e6c797544b2c7f0a0fc5f5afda6~ 74f741d49c3763d082fc15fda7f342515faf4210 (read the commits in the wrong date order)\n\nSince this has cropped up again IMHO either something like the fix in this PR should be merged or if not maybe we should at least add an extra step to the documentation informing users they MUST always explicitly set the ownership on the `/etc/bitcoin` directory.
